content.question: Task 3: Conversation You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. Introduction: You will have a conversation about your school with Wang Limin, a school principal from Shanghai who is visiting your school. Response 1

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
